languages.text: "О. Ну. Спасибо... наверное? Но можно я попозже стану той, кем хочу, шерин? А пока мы в Комморре, мне как-то больше по душе быть солдатом. Уж прости".

traits.locale_text: "О. Ну. Спасибо... наверное? Но можно я попозже стану той, кем хочу, шерин? А пока мы в Комморре, мне как-то больше по душе быть солдатом. Уж прости".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."
languages.original_text: "О. Ну. Спасибо... наверное? Но можно я попозже стану той, кем хочу, шерин? А пока мы в Комморре, мне как-то больше по душе быть солдатом. Уж прости".

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I guess? But can I be whoever I want some other time, shereen? I feel like being a soldier while we are stuck in Commorragh for some reason. Cannot imagine why."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I guess? But can I be whoever I want some other time, shereen? I feel like being a soldier while we are stuck in Commorragh for some reason. Cannot imagine why."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢。好吧，谢谢……我猜？只是在别的时候，我真的可以成为我想成为的人吗，亲爱的？不过，咱们被困在科摩罗的这段时间里，当个士兵对我来说再合适不过了，我也不知道是为什么。”
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: “噢。好吧，谢谢……我猜？只是在别的时候，我真的可以成为我想成为的人吗，亲爱的？不过，咱们被困在科摩罗的这段时间里，当个士兵对我来说再合适不过了，我也不知道是为什么。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

languages.text: «Oh. Bueno, gracias... supongo. Pero ¿podría ser la persona que me gustaría ser en otro momento, shereen? Mientras estamos atrapad{mf|o|a}s en Commorragh, me siento más cómoda como soldado, por algún motivo incomprensible».
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: «Oh. Bueno, gracias... supongo. Pero ¿podría ser la persona que me gustaría ser en otro momento, shereen? Mientras estamos atrapad{mf|o|a}s en Commorragh, me siento más cómoda como soldado, por algún motivo incomprensible».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、ありがとう…でも、本当になりたい自分になれるのは、また今度にしましょう。コモラフで立ち往生している間は、兵士でいる方が性に合ってるんだ…なんでかはわからないけどね」
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、ありがとう…でも、本当になりたい自分になれるのは、また今度にしましょう。コモラフで立ち往生している間は、兵士でいる方が性に合ってるんだ…なんでかはわからないけどね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh. Nun ... Danke? Aber kann ich wann anders die Person, die ich wirklich sein möchte, Shereen? Während wir in Commorragh feststecken, ist es mir lieber, Soldatin zu bleiben. Ich weiß auch nicht recht warum."
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: "Oh. Nun ... Danke? Aber kann ich wann anders die Person, die ich wirklich sein möchte, Shereen? Während wir in Commorragh feststecken, ist es mir lieber, Soldatin zu bleiben. Ich weiß auch nicht recht warum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh. Eh bien, merci... je suppose, mais ça va devoir attendre, shereen. Tant qu'on est {mf|coincés|coincées} à Commorragh, je me sens mieux dans la peau d'un soldat. Je me demande bien pourquoi... »
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: « Oh. Eh bien, merci... je suppose, mais ça va devoir attendre, shereen. Tant qu'on est {mf|coincés|coincées} à Commorragh, je me sens mieux dans la peau d'un soldat. Je me demande bien pourquoi... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah. Sağ ol o zaman, ne diyeyim? Gerçekten olmak istediğim kişiyi daha sonra olayım mı ama şirinim? Commorragh'tayken askerlik daha mantıklıymış gibi hissediyorum. Durum malum."
languages.original_text: "Oh. Well, thanks... I suppose? But can I be the person I really want to be some other time, shereen? But while we're stuck in Commorragh, being a soldier just sits better with me. Can't imagine why."

traits.locale_text: "Ah. Eh, sağ ol o zaman, ne diyeyim? Gerçekten olmak istediğim kişiyi daha sonra olayım mı ama şirinim? Commorragh'ta kısılı kalmışken bir asker olmak daha mantıklıymış gibi hissediyorum. Bilmiyorum neden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
